title: RIOT PLEASE HELP
body:
Okay, I've been having tons of problems and every time I go to the support page it logs me out so i can never submit a ticket. The first problem was that every time I get into my promos every lose counts as 2. This problem was not as major as when i found of someone hacked into my account, but I found the site wouldn't let me change the password. I am very concerned as I never share my password, the password is specific to this one account, and I have never fallen for a "free riot points" scam. Please help!

(Update: I managed to change my password via the "I forgot my password" option. I would still like help with he malfunctioning support page and promos tracker, I can send in video proof of the problems I needed.)

replies.body: Try a different browser or a different computer or phone. The support page is likely a browser issue on your computer.
Thank you for your support! I disabled ad-block and privacy badger and the problem was fixed!

Failing to login to the ticketing center is pretty strange, and might be caused by an extension.  You may also need to clear your [cache and cookies](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) or try another browser.  If that fails, you can reach out to us any time via support@riotgames.com!

I'm taking a look at your ranked games, but I don't see any recent promotions here since last month.  Do you have a screenshot of what you're seeing so I can better understand?

I'm glad you were also able to recover your password.  Feel free to hit us up through email, though, if things seem awry!

The promotional problem was a problem I ignored until now, it wasn't super recent but within this month i believe. I have a video of the incident, is there a place i can send that? (It happened in my B2 to B1 promos and my B1 to S5 promos)

(Update: I disabled all extensions for the support page, thank you so much! I just realized that I could upload the video to YouTube, I will make the video unlisted to it doesn't attract negative attention towards riot games, I will post the link when the video is done uploading)

(This is the video i recorded: https://youtu.be/6ZPvrnQ2AsQ )
